parsed.title: O mito sangrento que atravessou séculos: de Trento a Poway
parsed.summary: Um antigo documento abre um fosso de sangue que ainda ecoa nos dias atuais. A xilogravura de 1475, que mostrava o menino Simonino como mártir, reaparece décadas depois em fóruns digitais, alimentando o ódio que culminou no ataque à sinagoga de Poway em 2019. O que une essas imagens, de um impresso a um post de 8chan, e por que a mentira persiste? Descubra o elo oculto que os conspiradores usam para transformar história em terror contemporâneo.

scenes.narration: Um arquivo foi aberto às 3h47 da manhã; minutos depois, o menino desaparecido reaparecia morto.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, close-up of ancient parchment with crimson seal, candle flame flickering, dust motes drifting, low angle, shadows dancing.
scenes.motionDescription: Slow dolly forward toward the parchment, candle flames gently swaying, dust particles drifting through light beam
scenes.audioDescription: Soft ambient drone, faint rustle of parchment, distant church bell toll

scenes.narration: A assinatura era de Hinderbach. O que esse registro escondia sobre a suposta vítima?
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, bishop's hand signing a document with ink dripping, quill trembling, candlelight casting deep shadows.
scenes.motionDescription: Gentle camera pan right to reveal bishop's hand signing, quill tip trembling slightly
scenes.audioDescription: Paper shuffling, quill scratching, low heartbeat

scenes.narration: A xilogravura de 1475 mostrou Simon sangrento; hoje, o mesmo rosto circula em 8chan.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, woodcut illustration of a blood‑stained child on an old printing press, illuminated by a single harsh light.
scenes.motionDescription: Static wide shot of printing press, woodcut image illuminated, slight zoom in on bloodied child illustration
scenes.audioDescription: Printer gears clanking, ink splatter, low hum

scenes.narration: Em 2019, John Earnest citou Simon, disparando contra a sinagoga de Poway, matando Lori.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, dimly lit room with a laptop displaying an 8chan thread, shadow of a rifle looming, red glow on screen.
scenes.motionDescription: Fast push-in on laptop screen, cursor flickering, shadows shifting across the room
scenes.audioDescription: Keyboard clicks, muted gunfire echo, tense synth pad

scenes.narration: Da imprensa à internet, a mesma mentira viraliza, alimentando ódio milenar sem fim eterno.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, abstract network of digital lines overlaying the medieval woodcut, red glitch pulses spreading across the image.
scenes.motionDescription: Subtle camera tilt up, digital glitch lines rippling across medieval illustration, red static flickering
scenes.audioDescription: Static crackle, rising tension strings, subtle heartbeat

scenes.narration: A verdade está nos arquivos. Siga The Gap Files para revelar o próximo segredo oculto.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, black screen with The Gap Files logo pulsating, faint light ripple, text overlay fading in.
scenes.motionDescription: Slow zoom out from The Gap Files logo, text fading in, light pulse radiating outward
scenes.audioDescription: Silence, then deep resonant tone, faint echo

backgroundMusic.prompt: Dark Ambient, Low Drone Synths, Sparse Piano Notes, Tension Strings, Eerie Pads, Subtle Heartbeat Rhythm, Minor Key, well-arranged composition, 70 BPM
